title: Font Manager for MAC
content:
I have been a longtime PC user who has used Adobe Font Manager, but I have moved to MAC and unfortunately it seems that the one drawback is that I will loose the years of organizing I did in ATM Pro. I am looking for the best program to buy and if there is any way of converting my font sets from ATM (which I am sure is not possible.

Thanks!!!  
Tom
author: cannon46

comments.content: Not sure re the conversion of your font sets from ATM, but I use Font explorer [http://www.fontexplorerx.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130304225214/http:/www.fontexplorerx.com/ "http://www.fontexplorerx.com/") which works really well. But I have to admit I have been looking at a fontshop product [https://www.fontshop.com/products/fontcase/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130304225214/https:/www.fontshop.com/products/fontcase/ "https://www.fontshop.com/products/fontcase/") which has some extra functionality.

FontCase from FontFont looks great! Does anyone have experience with this program. I am ready to pull the trigger.

Tom
